Package net.grinder.util.thread

Threading utilities.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
InterruptibleRunnable Like Runnable, but guarantees that InterruptibleRunnable.interruptibleRun() will be cleanly exited if the thread is interrupted.
ThreadPool.InterruptibleRunnableFactory Factory that is called to create an InterruptibleRunnable for each thread.
 

Class Summary
BooleanCondition Lock object that has two states.
Condition Object used for synchronisation.
Executor Work queue and worker threads.
InterruptibleRunnableAdapter Adapt a InterruptibleRunnable to a Runnable.
ThreadPool A simple thread pool.
ThreadSafeQueue<T> Thread-safe queue.
 

Exception Summary
Executor.ShutdownException Exception that indicates Executor has been shutdown.
ThreadSafeQueue.ShutdownException Exception that indicates ThreadSafeQueue has been shutdown.
 

Package net.grinder.util.thread Description

Threading utilities.

This package should probably be deprecated in favour of JSR 166 / backport-util-concurrent..
